lead_paragraph: In a step aimed at tackling the growing problem of antibiotic resistance, the Food and Drug Administration proposed a rule that would require makers of drugs for livestock to detail their antibiotic sales by type of animal.

headline.print_headline: Proposed Rule Seeks Details on Antibiotics in Livestock
headline.main: Proposed Rule Seeks Details on Antibiotics in Livestock

snippet: In a step aimed at tackling the growing problem of antibiotic resistance, the Food and Drug Administration proposed a rule that would require makers of drugs for livestock to detail their antibiotic sales by type of animal.
abstract: Food and Drug Admin issues rule requiring drug makers who service livestock to report detailed information about antibiotics sales by animal types, part of effort to address antibiotic resistance problem.
